welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Timperley, the charming town known for its picturesque streets, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and leisure airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving long-haul and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
